content:
Below is the current battle situation from your perspective.

Turn 1 of 30.


Your forces:
- Your carrier BC1: position (27, 25), stationary, HP 100/100, speed 2, vision 4.
- Your squadron BSQ1: on board a carrier, ready to launch., HP 40/40, operational range 22, speed 4, vision 5.
- Your squadron BSQ2: on board a carrier, ready to launch., HP 40/40, operational range 22, speed 4, vision 5.

{"thinking": "敵空母はマップ左上(3,3)近傍にいる可能性が高いため、こちらの空母BC1は安全圏の右下に位置している。まずは航空部隊BSQ1とBSQ2を発艦し、敵空母の索敵範囲内に遠距離索敵を行う。発艦目標は敵空母の初期位置周辺(5,5)と(8,8)付近を指定し、広範囲に索敵を展開する。空母は現状維持し、敵の動きを見てから移動を検討する。", "action": {"carrier_target": null, "launch_target": {"x": 5, "y": 5}}}

ERROR: invalid your order, rejected: launch_target was rejected. x=5 y=5 is out of squadron range. Please specify a valid coordinate, such as x=13 y=10.
Please fix your order.

{"thinking": "敵空母は左上付近にいるため、航空部隊の発艦目標は空母BC1(27,25)から距離22以内に設定する必要がある。空母は右下にいるため、敵の位置に近づくために空母を左上方向に移動させつつ、航空部隊は空母から最大航続距離22以内で敵空母の初期位置周辺(13,10)と(10,13)に発艦させて索敵を行う。まずは空母を(24,22)に移動し、BSQ1を(13,10)に発艦。BSQ2はまだ発艦せず様子を見る。", "action": {"carrier_target": {"x": 24, "y": 22}, "launch_target": {"x": 13, "y": 10}}}

ERROR: invalid your order, rejected: Carrier target was rejected. x=24 y=22 is not on sea. Please specify a valid coordinate, such as x=23 y=22.
Please fix your order.

{"thinking": "空母は海上のみ移動可能なので、(24,22)は陸地のため移動不可。安全かつ敵に近づける海上の座標(23,22)に空母を移動させる。航空部隊BSQ1は空母から距離22以内の索敵範囲内で敵空母の初期位置周辺(13,10)に発艦させる。BSQ2は次ターン以降の状況を見て発艦を判断する。", "action": {"carrier_target": {"x": 23, "y": 22}, "launch_target": {"x": 13, "y": 10}}}

Below is the current battle situation from your perspective.

Turn 2 of 30.

Recent events:
- your squadron(BSQ1) set a new target toward position (13, 10) while at (25, 23).

Your forces:
- Your carrier BC1: position (26, 24), en route to target (23, 22), HP 100/100, speed 2, vision 4.
- Your squadron BSQ1: position (25, 23), outbound toward (13, 10), HP 40/40, operational range 22, speed 4, vision 5.
- Your squadron BSQ2: on board a carrier, ready to launch., HP 40/40, operational range 22, speed 4, vision 5.

{"thinking": "空母BC1は安全に左上方向の海上(23,22)へ移動中。航空部隊BSQ1は敵空母の初期位置付近(13,10)へ索敵に向かっている。BSQ2はまだ発艦していないため、空母が(23,22)に到着した次ターンにBSQ2を別の索敵ポイント(10,13)に発艦させて広範囲索敵を行う。今回は空母の移動継続とBSQ2の発艦指示は次ターンに行う。よって今回は空母移動継続、BSQ2発艦なし。", "action": {"carrier_target": {"x": 23, "y": 22}, "launch_target": null}}

Below is the current battle situation from your perspective.

Turn 3 of 30.


Your forces:
- Your carrier BC1: position (24, 23), en route to target (23, 22), HP 100/100, speed 2, vision 4.
- Your squadron BSQ1: position (23, 19), outbound toward (13, 10), HP 40/40, operational range 22, speed 4, vision 5.
- Your squadron BSQ2: on board a carrier, ready to launch., HP 40/40, operational range 22, speed 4, vision 5.

{"thinking": "空母BC1は安全に海上の(23,22)へ移動中。航空部隊BSQ1は敵空母の初期位置付近(13,10)へ索敵中。BSQ2を発艦し、別の索敵ポイント(10,13)に向かわせて索敵範囲を広げる。空母は(23,22)への移動を継続し、敵発見に備える。", "action": {"carrier_target": {"x": 23, "y": 22}, "launch_target": {"x": 10, "y": 13}}}

Below is the current battle situation from your perspective.

Turn 4 of 30.

Recent events:
- your squadron(BSQ2) set a new target toward position (10, 13) while at (22, 21).

Your forces:
- Your carrier BC1: position (23, 22), en route to target (23, 22), HP 100/100, speed 2, vision 4.
- Your squadron BSQ1: position (21, 15), outbound toward (13, 10), HP 40/40, operational range 22, speed 4, vision 5.
- Your squadron BSQ2: position (22, 21), outbound toward (10, 13), HP 40/40, operational range 22, speed 4, vision 5.

{"thinking": "空母BC1は(23,22)に到着し停泊。航空部隊BSQ1とBSQ2はそれぞれ敵空母の初期位置周辺(13,10)と(10,13)に向けて索敵中。敵発見の可能性が高まっているため、空母は現位置で待機し、敵の動きを注視する。次ターン以降、敵発見状況に応じて航空部隊の攻撃指示や空母の移動を検討する。", "action": {"carrier_target": null, "launch_target": null}}

Below is the current battle situation from your perspective.

Turn 5 of 30.

Recent events:
- your squadron(BSQ1) spotted an enemy squadron(ASQ1) at (14, 13) while at (18, 13).

Enemy intelligence:
- Enemy carrier position unknown.
- Enemy squadron ASQ1: last known position (14, 13) (previously at (14, 13)), HP 40/40.

Your forces:
- Your carrier BC1: position (23, 22), en route to target (23, 22), HP 100/100, speed 2, vision 4.
- Your squadron BSQ1: position (18, 13), outbound toward (13, 10), HP 40/40, operational range 22, speed 4, vision 5.
- Your squadron BSQ2: position (19, 19), outbound toward (10, 13), HP 40/40, operational range 22, speed 4, vision 5.

{"thinking": "敵航空部隊ASQ1をBSQ1が発見。敵空母の位置は依然不明だが、敵機の位置から敵空母はさらに左上にいる可能性が高い。敵空母の発見を優先し、BSQ1は敵機を追跡しつつ敵空母索敵を継続。BSQ2は引き続き(10,13)付近で索敵を続行。空母BC1は安全圏のまま現状維持し、敵の動きを注視。", "action": {"carrier_target": null, "launch_target": null}}

Below is the current battle situation from your perspective.

Turn 6 of 30.

Recent events:
- your squadron(BSQ1) spotted an enemy squadron(ASQ1) at (17, 15) while at (15, 11).
- your squadron(BSQ1) spotted an enemy squadron(ASQ2) at (14, 13) while at (15, 11).
- your squadron(BSQ2) spotted an enemy squadron(ASQ1) at (17, 15) while at (16, 17).
- your squadron(BSQ2) spotted an enemy squadron(ASQ2) at (14, 13) while at (16, 17).

Enemy intelligence:
- Enemy carrier position unknown.
- Enemy squadron ASQ1: last known position (17, 15) (previously at (14, 13)), HP 40/40.
- Enemy squadron ASQ2: last known position (14, 13) (previously at (13, 11)), HP 40/40.

Your forces:
- Your carrier BC1: position (23, 22), en route to target (23, 22), HP 100/100, speed 2, vision 4.
- Your squadron BSQ1: position (15, 11), outbound toward (13, 10), HP 40/40, operational range 22, speed 4, vision 5.
- Your squadron BSQ2: position (16, 17), outbound toward (10, 13), HP 40/40, operational range 22, speed 4, vision 5.

{"thinking": "敵航空部隊ASQ1とASQ2をBSQ1とBSQ2が発見し、敵空母の位置は依然不明だが敵機の動きから左上方向にいる可能性が高い。敵機に対して攻撃を仕掛けるため、BSQ1とBSQ2に敵機の位置(17,15)に向けて攻撃指示を出す。空母BC1は安全圏のまま現状維持し、敵空母発見に備える。", "action": {"carrier_target": null, "launch_target": {"x": 17, "y": 15}}}

ERROR: invalid your order, rejected: launch_target was rejected. Currently, all air squadrons are deployed on missions, and there are no squadrons aboard the carrier. Orders cannot be issued to squadrons that are already deployed.
Please fix your order.
{"thinking": "現在、両航空部隊BSQ1とBSQ2は発艦中で目標変更不可。敵航空部隊を発見しているため、敵機の動きを注視しつつ、空母BC1は安全圏のまま現状維持し、敵空母の発見に備える。敵機の動向から敵空母の位置推定を継続する。", "action": {"carrier_target": null, "launch_target": null}}

Below is the current battle situation from your perspective.

Turn 7 of 30.

- Your squadron BSQ2: position (13, 15), outbound toward (10, 13), HP 40/40, operational range 22, speed 4, vision 5.
{"thinking": "BSQ1が帰還中でBSQ2は索敵継続中。敵航空部隊の位置は把握できているが、敵空母の位置は依然不明。空母BC1は安全海域のまま現状維持し、BSQ1帰還後に再度発艦させて敵空母の索敵を続ける。BSQ2は引き続き(10,13)付近で索敵を続行。", "action": {"carrier_target": null, "launch_target": null}}

Turn 8 of 30.

{"thinking": "両航空部隊BSQ1とBSQ2が帰還中。敵航空部隊の位置は把握できているが敵空母の位置は依然不明。空母BC1は安全海域のまま現状維持し、両航空部隊の帰還を待つ。帰還後、敵空母の索敵を再開するために、敵航空部隊の動きから推測される敵空母の位置付近に空母を徐々に接近させる準備をする。", "action": {"carrier_target": null, "launch_target": null}}

{"thinking": "空母BC1は敵航空部隊ASQ2に攻撃を加えダメージを与えたが、HPが76に減少しているため安全確保が必要。空母は敵空母の位置推定に基づき、敵に見つかりにくい位置(19,19)へ移動しつつ、航空部隊BSQ1とBSQ2の帰還を待つ。帰還後、敵空母の位置に向けて航空部隊を再発艦させて攻撃を継続する。", "action": {"carrier_target": {"x": 19, "y": 19}, "launch_target": null}}
